definition: gall bladder/courage/guts/gall/inner container (e.g. bladder of a football, inner container of a thermos)
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The pearly gallstone was discharged after Treatment with Magnetic Field (TMF).
sentences.chinese: 由旋磁疗法治疗胆石症患者获得珍珠形胆结石。

sentences.english: Objective To study the correlation between cholelithiasis and the infection of HBV.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨乙肝病毒感染在胆石症发病中的作用。

sentences.english: Methods The clinical data of 24 patients with cholelithiasis and cirrhosis receiving operation were summarized.
sentences.chinese: 方法总结24例胆石症合并肝硬化外科治疗的病例。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the laparoscopic cholecystectomy and its indications for the cholelithiasis in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的讨论小儿胆石症的腹腔镜治疗及其适应证。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the value of the clinical application of postoperative choledochofiberscopy (POC).
sentences.chinese: 目的评价分析胆石症术后胆道镜取石术临床应用价值。

sentences.english: Objective To study the problems of surgical treatment of senile biliary cholelithiasis and biliary infection.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨老年人胆石症胆感染外科的治疗状况。

sentences.english: Conclusion Internal and external medicine in effective for cholelithiasis.
sentences.chinese: 提示中药内服外敷是治疗胆石症的有效方法。

sentences.english: Cholelithiasis is the most common disease in our country.
sentences.chinese: 胆石症是我国的常见病。

sentences.english: Conclusion There might be good effect for cholelithiasis with this method.
sentences.chinese: 结论胆石利通片治疗胆石症有很好的疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the pathogenic relation between diabetes and cholelithiasis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨糖尿病与胆石症之间的发病关系。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the diagnosis and treatment of cholelithiasis in childhood.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨小儿胆石症的诊断与治疗方法。
